  • Uses of Payment in src.model

    Subclasses of Payment in src.model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Invoice
    Represents an invoice, extending the Payment class to include housing-specific fields such as the applicant's NRIC, project name, and flat type.
